Question
========
Let $A$ and $B$ be two events of a same sample space, such that $P(A)=3/8$, $P(B)=1/2$ and $P(A\cap B)=1/4$.
Compute the following probabilities:
a. $P(A\cup B)$.
a. $P(\overline{A})$ and $P(\overline{B})$.
a. $P(\overline{A}\cap \overline{B})$.
a. $P(A\cap \overline{B})$.
a. $P(A|B)$.
a. $P(A|\overline{B})$.
a. Are $A$ and $B$ compatible? Are $A$ and $B$ dependent?
